statements: SELECT * FROM influencer_marketing_platform
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_followers, influencer_category FROM influencer_marketing_platform
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM influencer_marketing_platform WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_category, campaign_name FROM influencer_marketing_platform WHERE influencer_followers > 10000
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM influencer_marketing_platform ORDER BY campaign_budget DESC
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_followers, influencer_category FROM influencer_marketing_platform;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_category, influencer_followers FROM influencer_marketing_platform WHERE influencer_category = 'Fashion' ORDER BY influencer_followers DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_followers, campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM influencer_marketing_platform WHERE campaign_budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_marketing_platform WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, influencer_name, influencer_followers FROM influencer_marketing_platform WHERE influencer_category = 'Beauty' AND influencer_followers > 100000 ORDER BY influencer_followers DESC, campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers > 1000;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers WHERE category = 'Fashion';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT id, name, followers, category FROM influencers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers WHERE followers > 100000 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, category FROM influencers WHERE category != 'Fashion' ORDER BY category DESC
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 AND category = 'Lifestyle'
SELECT id, campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-10-31';
SELECT name, payment FROM collaborations WHERE payment > 1000;
SELECT influencer_id, campaign_id FROM collaborations ORDER BY payment DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT campaigns.name, collaborations.payment FROM campaigns JOIN collaborations ON campaigns.id = collaborations.campaign_id;

SELECT influencers.name, campaigns.name, collaborations.payment FROM influencers JOIN collaborations ON influencers.id = collaborations.influencer_id JOIN campaigns ON campaigns.id = collaborations.campaign_id WHERE collaborations.payment > 500;

SELECT influencers.name AS influencer_name, collaborations.id AS collab_id, campaigns.name AS campaign_name FROM influencers JOIN collaborations ON influencers.id = collaborations.influencer_id JOIN campaigns ON campaigns.id = collaborations.campaign_id ORDER BY collaborations.id DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencers ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate, post_count FROM influencers JOIN influencer_stats ON influencers.influencer_id = influencer_stats.influencer_id;

SELECT campaign_name, influencer_name, campaign_status FROM campaigns JOIN campaign_influencers ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_influencers.campaign_id JOIN influencers ON campaign_influencers.influencer_id = influencers.influencer_id;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencers WHERE category = 'Fashion' ORDER BY follower_count DESC;

SELECT c.campaign_name, c.start_date, c.budget, i.influencer_name FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_influencers ci ON c.campaign_id = ci.campaign_id JOIN influencers i ON ci.influencer_id = i.influencer_id WHERE ci.campaign_status = 'Active';

SELECT i.influencer_name, ISNULL(is.interaction_count, 0) AS interaction_count FROM influencers i LEFT JOIN influencer_stats is ON i.influencer_id = is.influencer_id WHERE i.follower_count > 10000 ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT i.influencer_name, SUM(is.interaction_count) AS total_interactions FROM influencers i JOIN influencer_stats is ON i.influencer_id = is.influencer_id GROUP BY i.influencer_name;

SELECT c.campaign_name, COUNT(ci.influencer_id) AS influencer_count FROM campaigns c LEFT JOIN campaign_influencers ci ON c.campaign_id = ci.campaign_id GROUP BY c.campaign_name HAVING influencer_count > 3 ORDER BY influencer_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';

SELECT influencers.name, campaigns.campaign_name FROM influencers INNER JOIN influencer_campaigns ON influencers.id = influencer_campaigns.influencer_id INNER JOIN campaigns ON influencer_campaigns.campaign_id = campaigns.id;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing' AND unit_price < 50;

SELECT influencers.name, campaigns.campaign_name, products.product_name FROM influencers JOIN influencer_campaigns ON influencers.id = influencer_campaigns.influencer_id JOIN campaigns ON influencer_campaigns.campaign_id = campaigns.id JOIN campaign_products ON campaigns.id = campaign_products.campaign_id JOIN products ON campaign_products.product_id = products.id;
